item.title: Network Infrastructure Specialist
item.dc:creator: CCCAdmin
item.content:encoded:
Qualifications:
  • Candidates must possess a Bachelors degree in Computer Science/ Information Technology
  • Must have 4 years experience in Networking and Systems Administration
  • Must have strong background in any of the following; BMC Remedy, Netcool, InfoVista, Splunk
  • Experience with databases
  • Experience and a good working knowledge of Linux operating system (Redhat)
  • Familiarity with network/application operation
  • Excellent communications skills (written and oral), good command of English is highly regarded
Responsibilities: BMC Remedy
  • Requests related to Remedy can typically include the following work:
  • Adding of data to Remedy:
  • Support agreement information
  • Support/Resolver teams
  • System owner
  • Support agreements
  • Configuration item data, e.g.:
    • IP address
    • Model
    • Location
    • Change approvers (Change management)
  • Asset data will be added to the system manually unless it is discovered and fed to the Asset Management system via another automated process
Netcool Requests related to IBM Netcool typically include the following work:
  • Probe rules work (OMNIbus) to define:
    • New events to be captured
    • Fields to be populated with new data
    • Business service relationship with specific sources / events
  • Discovery of new IP-enabled devices for availability management (ITNM)
  • Discovery of new IP-enabled devices for backup and restore of network device Operating System (configuration)
InfoVista Requests related to InfoVista typically include the following work:
  • Configuration of tool to capture new performance metrics
  • Configuring reporting
o Collection frequency o Graphs Splunk Requests related to Splunk typically include the following work:
  • Configuring tool to capture new system logs
  • Configuring tool for specific retention periods
  • Installation of relevant Apps
  • Configure data to be Common Information Model (CIM) compliant
  • Create alerts
  • Indexing of data to ensure responsiveness to user requests

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Network Infrastructure Specialist - CCC Data Management
Network, BMC Remedy, Netcool, InfoVista, Splunk

item.title: Accounting Specialists
item.dc:creator: CCCAdmin
item.content:encoded:
Accounting Specialist

We are looking for an Amazing Accountant to work with our Australian clients! As an Amazing Accountant you will be part of an Amazing Company and put in action your amazing passion for providing amazing service and contribute to a high level of client satisfaction. Plus an opportunity to travel in Australia! Qualifications:
  • A degree in accountancy
  • 2-3 years experience preferably with Australian accounts
  • Knowledge in Xero and MYOB (not a must but a BIIIIG PLUS)
  • Language skill spelling, grammar, word usage
  • Thoroughness and high level of analytical skill
What tasks will you do?With your world-class skill in accounting you will connect with our Australian clients to work on very familiar areas such as bank reconciliations, bookkeeping, BAS preparations, Financial Statements preparations and Tax compliance. No sweat! Additionally, you might work with an amazing team to provide the service and resolve client issues. How do we hire? Easy as -> send us a resume (no, you dont have to update it if you dont have one ready) and then -> we call you and see if you qualify for -> an interview with the client which, of course, you will pass with flying colors and then -> youre one of our amazing accountants! See? Not that hard. What else do we need from you? Nothing. Well, we need you to consider this. Where are we? Why, in Makati, the central business district of the Philippines!.

item.title: Senior Microsoft Developer
item.dc:creator: CCCAdmin
item.content:encoded:
Responsibilities
  • Design, develop and implement software solutions to meet business requirements.
  • Troubleshoot, analyze and enhance existing systems and processes.
  • Work within project teams to achieve key business goals.
Interactions
  • With other members of the IT development and operations team.
  • With business project sponsors and business project team members.
Skills
  • Able to develop quality user interfaces
  • Understanding of webtechnologiesand specifically developing web applications in .NET.
  • Understanding of Microsoft technologies (.NET, IIS, Web Services).
  • Ability to develop specification, design, end-user and system documentation.
  • Able to translate business problems into technical solutions.
  • Able to work to project schedules and meet deadlines.
Knowledge
  • NET
  • C#.NET
  • T-SQL
  • Net MVC
  • Web API
  • ASPX
  • WPF
  • An understanding of industry best practices and development methodologies

item.title: Will my offshore team work the same hours I do?
item.dc:creator: CCCAdmin
item.content:encoded:
Our offices operate flexibly around the requirements of its Clients. Work hours are followed in accordance with Clients requests including public holidays and weekend work as required. Due to the time difference of only 0 2 hours for West/East coast Australia and 4 for New Zealand a typical day is not too far removed from local hours, enabling an easy synergy for local staff and long term benefits for all.
The only public holidays which cause the offices to close are Christmas and Easter and those dates are the same in all countries.

item.title: Will my offshore team be able to use my accounting software?
item.dc:creator: CCCAdmin
item.content:encoded: CCCstaff have experience in most software packages currently available in the market place, these include Xero, MYOB, QuickBooks, SAP to name a few. We can use cloud based or integrated desktop software as per your current licensing setup.

item.title: Do I have to sign a long term contract?
item.dc:creator: CCCAdmin
item.content:encoded:
We typically work on a twelve month basis, although there is usually a built in trial period of three months.
Most of our clients have been with us for five or more years and some in excess of 20 years.

item.title: How do I train my offshore team?
item.dc:creator: CCCAdmin
item.content:encoded:
After recruitment and before commencing an engagement, your team member will require training in your internal processes if you have an induction programme it will be tailored to them.
If the software you use is bespoke or quirky, you will include that training as a part of your induction.

item.title: Do I need to pay super or pensions to Philippine employees?
item.dc:creator: CCCAdmin
item.content:encoded: No you will not, our fees include all wages and on-costs forthe employees.

item.title: How much can I save by offshoring?
item.dc:creator: CCCAdmin
item.content:encoded:
The cost of staffing in Australia and New Zealand has many hidden costs outside the standard salary being paid to your workers.
Additional to the base wage you have:
Superannuation 9.5% (and increasing) Kiwisaver currently 4% and increasing Annual leave 4 weeks p.a. plus 17.5% loading in some cases Public Holidays 10 days p.a. in Australia, 11 days p.a. in New Zealand Sick/Personal Leave up to 10 days p.a. Workers compensation insurance or ACC Levies- % depends on the industry Payroll Tax this varies depending on the State but can be as high as 6%
A typical saving is between 50 80% depending on the role, industry and level.

item.title: I'm worried about the security of offshoring work
item.dc:creator: CCCAdmin
item.content:encoded: We take security very seriously at CCC,learn more about our security

item.title: I'm worried about paying in a foreign currency, can I pay in my local currency?
item.dc:creator: CCCAdmin
item.content:encoded: We have bank accounts in Australian Dollars, US Dollars, NZ Dollars and Philippines Peso so there is no exchange risk once you select the currency for invoicing purposes

item.title: How do I contact my offshore team?
item.dc:creator: CCCAdmin
item.content:encoded: Contact can be made through email as you would any team member. For meetings we typically use Skype (or your preferred) video calling. We are also able to setupa VPN telephone so that no charges are incurred in communication.

item.title: What happens on my public holidays?
item.dc:creator: CCCAdmin
item.content:encoded: Our hours of operation are based on ourclients country of origin and we operate hours and days accordingly

item.title: Can my offshore team use my software?
item.dc:creator: CCCAdmin
item.content:encoded: Of course. The only proviso is that such software can be accessed by our office either through cloud or internet based on the clients own security arrangements. Ifnecessary we can provide secure cloud based data centre

item.title: Can I regularly see and check in with my offshore team?
item.dc:creator: CCCAdmin
item.content:encoded: They are your team, you can contact them as often as you need to.

item.title: Why Offshore
item.dc:creator: CCCAdmin
item.content:encoded:
Offshoring is when you outsource business functions to a team in another country. For small to medium businesses the costs of setting up an operation in a distant country made it prohibitive to consider until relatively recently. Nowadays there are many companies all over the world who can meet the demand for offshore services. Three main centres for offshore/outsourcing are India, China and The Philippines. There are a number of companies offering virtual assistants and the like. And whilst it might seem like an easy fix, it can often involve hassle, risk and ultimately will notdrive real value to your business. For offshoring to be successful, particularly over the long term businessesneed to finda trusted offshore partner. The sorts of benefits this can offer are
  • Substantially reduce local staffand overheads
  • Provide the ability to scale your business efficiently
  • Allow you to focus on your core strengths and business

Understanding the cost benefits of offshoring

The cost of staffing in Australia and New Zealand has many hidden costs outside the standard salary being paid to your workers. [epc_panel style="callout radius"]

Additional to the base wage you have:

  • Superannuation 9.5% (and increasing)
  • Kiwisaver currently 4% and increasing
  • Annual leave 4 weeks p.a. plus 17.5% loading in some cases
  • Public Holidays 10 days p.a. in Australia, 11 days p.a. in New Zealand
  • Sick/Personal Leave up to 10 days p.a.
  • Workers compensation insurance or ACC Levies- % depends on the industry
  • Payroll Tax this varies depending on the State but can be as high as 6%
  • Office space and associated costs
[/epc_panel] A base salary of A$50,000 can cost the employer in excess of $70,000 pa Finding a partner who understands your business and is able to help you transition to offshoring is critical to success. Learn more about how CCC Data Management Solutions can help you.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Offshoring is gaining popularity. Learn about the various benefits of outsourcing and how CCC DMS can help you begin your offshoring endeavour.
Get in touch to learnmore about how CCC can help you grow your business
Why Outsource - Growing Your Business - CCC DMS

item.title: Why Choose The Philippines
item.dc:creator: CCCAdmin
item.content:encoded:
The Philippines is one of the fastest growing economies in Asia with a growing offshore industry. Increasingly global businesses, particularly those headquartered in the US, Asia, Australia and New Zealand are recognizing the benefits of offshoring to the Philippines.

As a location Philippines has distinct advantages of:

  1. A culture historically influenced by the West and through shared values and social customs
  2. A stable economy, currently one of the fastest growing economies in Asia with incentives to encourage growth of offshore business
  3. A stable political environment.
  4. A favourable timezone particularly for Asia, Australia, New Zealand and the US
  5. English is taught in schools and is an official national language, along with Filipino (Tagalog)
  6. A highly literate population

Staff from the Philippines are typically hired for offshore work because of their attributes:

  1. University educated with sound professional and corporate experience in fields including accountancy, IT, Data and HR/Recruitment
  2. An excellent command of the English language, both written and spoken
  3. A strong work ethic
  4. Good understanding of technology
Finding a trusted offshore partner is key to long term success in outsourcing and realising the benefits of outsourcing to The Philippines.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Get in touch to learnmore about how CCC can help you grow your business
Benefits of Outsourcing to the Phillippines - CCC DMS
Where is the best place to send outsourced work? Find out form the experts why the Philippines always tops the list.

item.title: Why Choose CCC
item.dc:creator: CCCAdmin
item.content:encoded:
While offshoring is often seen purely as a low cost solution to a problem, we believe that in order for it to be successful, cost is only part of the picture. We are able to fulfilmany types of roles, processes and daily tasks for everything from small businesses through to growing mid size companies and complex global companies in areas/functions including:
  • Data management
  • Accounting services
  • Recruitment services
  • Shared services
Our dedicated staffare located in Makati, Philippines, in the heart of Manilas CBD . We offer the same low costs as other offshore groups, (typically between 50 70% of onshore costs) but do not believe that is enough of a business benefit. Consequently, from initial engagement through to management of your teams, we aim to offer unrivalled service and support to ensure long term, successful outsourcing for your business. We do this because we have:

Experts in Accounting, Data Management, Recruitment and IT

Perhaps uniquely in the market, the principals at CCC have deep experience of several industries having run successful accounting practices, recruitment and IT consultancies and, of course, data management. We understand the needs of businesses in Australia and New Zealand. It enables us to be proactive and strategic in helping you make the most of your offshore team

Our service is our strength

From the onshore leadership team, to the offshore management through to the teams servicing your business, we offer a real partnership and an extension to your office. We visit the Philippines regularly and have close working relationships with the team. This leadership and mentorship of the offshore team supervisors is to ensure that the experience both for our clients and for the local teams working with our clients is optimal. Our teams see themselves as an extension of your teams. In some ways they have more support than your local teams in that they are also a part of the CCC team. We see part of our service to you is that your employees enjoy their experience of work from team building and regular catch-ups and mentoring. [epc_panel style="callout radius"] Dont take our word for it!Read ourtestimonials [/epc_panel]

Significant Experience in The Philippines

CCC has had been working in The Philippines doing BPO (Business Process Outsourcing) for over30 years. This experience has also led us to a structure whereby the onshore support to an offshore business is a key to its success. Our onshore experts help setup and oversee your offshore team.This helps ensure long term success of offshoring for your business.

Strong Security

CCC understands the need for strong security and privacy over client data and we been following best practice for a long time. We have state of the art security measures in place and take this aspect of service delivery very seriously. Learn more about our security

Fair and transparent pricing

Businesses are able to lower their operating costs through relocating suitable roles to our Manila based team. The decrease in operating costs is achieved by accessing highly productive, university qualified professionals at a rate that is substantially below what you would expect to pay in the Australian or New Zealand market typically we can place staff for between 50 70% less than hiring locally.

Always on

Our hours of operation can be 24 hours a day, seven days a week. Although we would typically work hours which coincide with your office hours, arrangements can be made for work to be done outside these hours. In addition workers are contracted to Australian calendars and will work all Philippine public holidays, although not Australian days with the exception of Christmas and Easter which we share. We also are able to cover workers taking their 12 day Philippine holiday entitlement with other qualified staff. [epc_panel style="callout radius"] Dont take our word for it!Read ourtestimonials [/epc_panel]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Get in touch to learnmore about how CCC can help you grow your business
Why Choose CCC DMS - Expert Outsourcing Solutions
With 30+ yrs of experience, we know the recipe for outsourcing success depends upon building a true partnership with your offshore team. Find out how today.

item.title: Building a Successful Offshore Partnership
item.dc:creator: CCCAdmin
item.content:encoded:
Offshoring shouldnt be seen as a quick fix to reduce costs. In order for an outsource partnership to be successful, a number of steps need to be taken:

  • Gain support of leadership and management
  • Appoint a committed offshoring champion to drive the process
  • Find a trusted offshore provider to work with your business
  • Ensure that business objectives and outsourcing objectives are clear, understood and that the teams work together to meet them
  • Understand technology requirements to setup your offshore team
  • Identify processes and ensure the provider can help you adapt and streamline them efficiently
  • Commit adequate resources to support the offshoring process
  • Treat the offshore provider as if it were your front office
  • Incorporate the outsource team members into your teams as far as possible
  • Ensure the working conditions at your offshore provider are optimal and that your offshore teams are happy and motivated
[epc_button text=" Learn more about CCC and our unique approach" link="" target="" size="expand" style="secondary" corner="radius" icon="fi-key" push="yes"]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Get in touch to learnmore about how CCC can help you grow your business
Successful Outsourcing & Offshore Partnerships - CCC DMS
A strong relationship with the offshore team is the key to successful outsourcing. Learn about our philosophy for ensuring a rewarding offshore partnership.

item.title: Offshoring and outsourcing
item.dc:creator: CCCAdmin
item.content:encoded: Welcome to the CCC Data Management Services blog - for our first few posts we thought we would break down some of the terms used in our industry. The terms offshoring and outsourcing are often used interchangeably but they are in fact two slightly different things. Outsourcing is when you take a discreet process or role in your business (for example, data entry) and use another form of labour to perform that function be that an agency, specialist firm or a freelancer. Even if you have never used the term yourself, if you are a small business of any size you are likely outsourcing some of the tasks in which you do not have core expertise. For example, if you are a small recruitment company you might choose to outsource your accounting work to a small accountancy firm rather than hiring an accountant inhouse. Or you might be a real estate firm and require data entry of all weekend viewings entered into your database. You might use a data entry agency to input data rather than waste the valuable time of your sales staff on this time consuming task. But offshoring is slightly different offshoring is when you have work carried out in an offshore location such as India, China or The Philippines. When people think of offshoring they usually imagine call centres as it has become so commonplace for organizations to offshore this work in the past few decades. If you want to be specific, the practices that CCC engages in are offshore outsourcing but we think its a little over the top to use both all the time and instead we use them interchangeably. The benefits of offshore outsourcing include reduction of operating costs. But there are risks finding skilled staff who can communicate effectively being among the chief culprits. Increasingly offshoring part of your business has become the norm for companies of all sizes. Finding a trusted partnerto work with you for the long term is critical for offshoring success. Next timewe will help break down BPO and Business Process Outsourcing.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Offshoring and outsourcing don't quite mean the same thing, we explore the difference

item.title: Data Management
item.dc:creator: CCCAdmin
item.content:encoded:
From big business to government to small and medium sized enterprise, data and data management are becoming increasingly core to business. Data management is important for most industries and many types of company. As data specialists with over 30 years experience we have a best in class approach to data management.

The services which we can provide include:

  • Data entry
  • Database creation
  • Data capture (from various media)
  • Optical character recognition (OCR)
  • Document scanning
  • Propagation of spread sheets from selected web sites
  • Web scraping
Our extensive business and industry experience is unique in the market.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Get in touch to learnmore about how CCC can help you grow your business
Outsourced Data Management - Data Experts - CCC DMS
Our offshore data specialists are proficient in many areas of data management, such as data entry & database creation. Learn more about data outsourcing.

With over 40 years outsourcing data in The Philippines, our management team, have a deep understanding of data mangement, in fact our company was founded with this skillset. This means we have a strong understanding of the needs and the issues typically faced for businesses wanting to outsource data managment.

Some of our customers in Data have been with us for over 25 years and include both large organisations and small businesses. While we are unable to reveal our client list, to ensure the security of their business and data, we are able to share their kind feedback on their CCC experience:

item.title: Accounting Services
item.dc:creator: CCCAdmin
item.content:encoded:
Our principals have between them over 60 years experience in accountancy. We have developed our service to ensure that we offer a credible, reliable service to independent accounting professionals. The staff we choose are vetted and experienced in a range of Accounting services. We also offer high levels of data and professional security.

Services we offer

  • Accounting Back of House
  • Administration
  • Book keeping
  • Accounts Receivable & Payable
  • Transactions to trial balance
  • Corporate compliance

Software

Typically we use: [gallery size="full" columns="4" link="none" ids="152,151,150,149"] While our preference is for cloud based software as it is far easier when working with co-located teams. But we are also able to accommodate your preferred software.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Get in touch to learnmore about how CCC can help you grow youraccounting practice, or the accounting function within your business
Online Accounting & Bookkeeping Services - CCC DMS
Trust a wide variety of accounting needs and services to our experienced professionals. Learn how an offshore team can help grow your accounting business.

Perhaps uniquely in the market, our management team, includes experienced accountants. This means we have a strong understanding of the potential for growth that offshoring can offer your business. It enables us to be proactive and strategic in helping you make the most of your offshore team.

Our Accounting team is growing from strength to strength as small and medium sized practices are realising the benefits of outsourcing with CCC. While we cant reveal our clients too much to ensure the security of their business, we are able to share their kind feedback on their CCC experience:

item.title: Shared Services
item.dc:creator: CCCAdmin
item.content:encoded:
Shared services groups together a number of key areas of support for business process outsourcing. CCC services clients across a number of these areas.

Call Centre

A dedicated Call Centre team which can provide both inbound and outbound call centre services.

IT Services

Programmers, Developers, iOS and Android Developers, Website Designers; Help Desk Support; IT Professionals to work on contract or permanent basis

Secretarial

Secretarial tasks which include transcription (audio typing), word-processing, spread-sheets, mail-outs and database management as well as virtual secretarial/PA services

Document Processing

Professionally designed and formatted documents and reports, including PDF conversions

Marketing Assistance

Beautifully prepared sales presentations, promotional brochures, flyers and newsletters

General Requirements

Other general administration that may include: Stationery Ordering, Travel Bookings, Diary Management, Conference Bookings, debt collection and many more functions.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Get in touch to learnmore about how CCC can help you grow your business
Shared Outsourced Services - Call Centres & IT - CCC DMS
Let our highly qualified offshore team handle your outsourced shared service needs, including marketing, secretarial, IT and call centre services.

Perhaps uniquely in the market, our management team, include IT professionals who have run IT consultancies. This means we have a strong understanding of the needs and the issues typically faced in running a business Australia and New Zealand. It enables us to be proactive and strategic in helping you make the most of your offshore team.
While we cant reveal our clients in full, to ensure the security of their buisness, we are able to share their kind feedback on their CCC experience:

item.title: Recruitment Services
item.dc:creator: CCCAdmin
item.content:encoded:
Whether you are a recruitment business looking to expand, or a business looking for support in your recruiting and HR functions so you can focus on your core business, CCC offers a range of tailored services to help.

End-to-end recruitment process

  • Job description
  • Placing job ads
  • Interviewing
  • Short-listing suitable candidates
  • Reference checking

Labour hire administration

  • Entering information into CRM
  • Determining shifts for an on-hire labour force
  • Communicating shifts to candidates
  • Time sheet administration
  • Using a well-established online CRM or adapting existing CRM

Payroll and invoicing including debt collection

  • Processing time sheets
  • Preparing payroll
  • Payroll administration
  • Processing invoices
  • Invoice administration
  • Debt collection

Compliance work

  • Payroll tax returns
  • BAS preparation
  • Remitting withheld tax from wages
  • Superannuation
  • Group certificates
  • GST remittances

Accounting and tax functions

  • All accounting functions (See our Accounting Services for more details)
  • P & L reporting (weekly, monthly and annually)
  • Preparation of statutory accounts
  • Preparation of BAS and tax returns

Debtor Financing

  • Arranging Debtor Finance through a reputable financier
  • Compliance with financiers requirements
  • Arranging finance to meet payroll requirement
  • Cash flow control

Benchmarking

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Get in touch to learnmore about how CCC can help you grow your recruitment business or the recruitment function within your business
Outsourced Recruitment Agency & Services - CCC DMS
Do you need recruiting/HR support? Are you a recruitment business ready to expand? Let CCC DMS outsource your recruitment needs to skilled professionals.

Perhaps uniquely in the market, our management team, includes recruitment professionals and have had experience in running recruitment businesses. This means we have a strong understanding of the needs and the issues typically faced in running your business. It enables us to be proactive and strategic in helping you make the most of your offshore team.
While we cant reveal our client list, to ensure the security of our clients business, we are able to share their kind feedback on their CCC experience

item.title: Frequently Asked Questions
item.dc:creator: CCCAdmin
item.content:encoded: General FAQs

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Get in touch to learnmore about how CCC can help you grow your business
Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) on Outsourcing - CCC DMS
Have a question about outsourcing? Want to learn more? Find detailed answers to your outsourcing questions in our FAQs.

item.title: Our Services
item.dc:creator: CCCAdmin
item.content:encoded:
Accounting Services

We have developed a full range of accounting services that can support a growing accounting practice, or allow your business to outsource its finance function - From administration to bookkeeping to compliance, CCC can tailor our services to support your individual needs.

Data management

We've been doing data entry for a long time for big corporates and governments. With world class security and suite of modern data capture techniques, our services are designed to ensure you have the right information to power your business, whatever the size.

Recruitment Services

Whether you are a recruitment business looking to expand, or a business looking for support in your recruiting and HR functions so you can focus on your core business, CCC offers a range of options to help make people your priority.

Shared Services

Our core shared service offerings are call centres and IT services. But that is only part of the picture - from marketing to clerical work, we are able to support a wide range of business functions.

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: CCCAdmin
item.content:encoded:
Commercial Computer Centrewas established in Australia in 1967 and expanded into the Philippines in 1986, where the business became synonymous with offshore data entry. The Philippinesgovernment has given a lot of encouragement to grow the industry locally. To meet increased demand for a variety of services beyond data entry, a new management team came on board in January 2014 to enable the expansion of our outsourcing services considerably and now offer divisions dedicated to:
  • Data Management
  • Accounting Services
  • Shared Services
  • Recruitment Services
We operate out of offices located centrally in the Makati (CBD) district of Manila.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Get in touch to learnmore about how CCC can help you grow your business
About CCC Data Management - Outsourcing Experts
Thinking of outsourcing your business? We have over 60 years of experience providing exceptional offshore services. Let us help you expand your business.

item.title: Our Team
item.dc:creator: CCCAdmin
item.content:encoded:
There are manyacronyms flying about the outsourcing industry(like BPO!) and a lot of talk about cost savings and efficiency. So it's really important to remember thisis a human business. Our people are our greatest asset and we work hard to ensure that we hire and retain the best. Ultimately, the team you hire are also an extension of both your team and our widerteam as they become a trusted part of your own business. So we would like tointroduce a few of our key people.

Sherwyne Anne O. Al Fouzan (General Manager for Human Resources and Administration / President )

has extensive professional work and leadership experience in human resource management. She held a variety of positions in Human Resource Management for both large and medium sized local and foreign corporations which contributed enormously to her significant expertise and profound credibility prior joining CCC as an HR Manager on May 2014. Her core competencies are Recruitment and Selection, Resource and Client Management, Employee Engagement and Relations, Performance Management and Training. Sher is also a talented freelance makeup artist.

Ruchel Pusung (General Manager for Accounting / Chief Financial Officer)

Ruchel is a Certified Public Accountant. Working for almost 10 years in the profession. She has worked as an Accountant/ Auditor on several industry such as whole selling, accommodation and food, building and construction, health care and personal services, manufacturing, transport and warehousing. Worked in Team of Accountants which provides tax planning, property development and superannuation services to client.

Edgar Sanchez (General Manager for Data Capture)

joined CCC in 1995 as a Data Encoder and within a span of 1 year was promoted to Quality Control Technician. He became Junior Programmer in 2000 and Production Manager in 2005. He is very much into volleyball and was one of the coaching staff of the Makati City delegation to the National Capital Region meet and the NCR delegation in the Nationals.

Sunday Doctolero (Information Technology Head)

The Doc startedas an agency based data encoder in CCC in 2010 and was absorbed by CCC Philippines in 2013. After a short breakhe returned as the companys Systems Support Specialist. The Doc worked as a High School Computer Instructor for four years and likesplaying volleyball and the fun of making computer programs and applications.

Maria Teresa Benito (ProductionManager)

was hired as a Data Entry Operator way back in July 1992 when the company was still known as Commercial Computer Centre (Phils.) Inc. She becamea Team Leader after 2 years and was raised to Project Manager of data entry in 1997. In January 2008 she was promoted toProduction Manager. She also plays badminton and loves to jog.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Learn more about how CCC can help you grow your business
About Our Team - The Outsourcing Experts - CCC DMS
It is the people that ensure successful offshoring, so we take care to hire and retain the best. Meet our talented Philippines team to learn more.

item.title: Our Management Team
item.dc:creator: CCCAdmin
item.content:encoded:
The CCC management team are a group of professionals with many years of experience building small to medium sized businesses in Australia and New Zealand. Their deep knowledge of the industries they service immediately gives them insight into how, why and where business process outsourcing (or Offshoring) can help grow your business. Coupled with over 30 years outsourcing experience CCC is atrusted partner for many businesses.

Jacob Tarszisz

Jacob has been building successful businesses for over 30 years. He sits on the boards of various private and public companies. His background is a Chartered Accountant working for large corporations. He owned Total Recruitment which he exited successfully in 2012. He is currently the Chairman of CCCDMS and works closely with the management team to lead its growth as a key player in the Philippines BPO industry.

Mark Bartolo

Mark Bartolo is a Chartered Accountant and Tax Agent. Having obtained his B.Com from Melbourne University in 1982, then worked for Peat Marwick Mitchell now part of the KPMG group.In 1991 Mark commenced MDB & Co a Chartered Accounting Practice. He has been involved in running medium sized accounting practices since 1990. [peekaboo name="bartolo"][peekaboo_content name="bartolo"]In 2007 Mark sold his interests in MDB. MDB was highly service orientated business that offered clients the full suite of services and products from Business Management, Benchmarking, Financial Planning and Compliance and Tax activities. Since 2007 Mark has been involved in a number of consulting roles including the offshoring of full accounting teams to the Philippines for Australian based public and private organisations. Recently Mark has also been involved in offshoring staff for accounting practices and is now a valued member of CCC. Mark possess a unique blend of skills and experience that fits perfectly with CCC and its current and prospective client base.[/peekaboo_content]

Mark Hubble

Mark has over 16 years experience in the IT Industry at Senior Account Management and Sales Management and General Managementlevels.[peekaboo name="hubble"] [peekaboo_content name="hubble"]After completing a double major at Otago University and a two year stint in Marketing and Sales in Auckland he spent the next fouryears in Europe, brokering large hardware deals to France and Spain. Mark returned to New Zealand and worked for IndeServe, a large backbone cabling company, as Senior Account Manager involving large Auckland based RFPs. Throughout the 4 years Mark worked for Maclean Computing initially as an Account Manager and then as Sales Manager. Marks career has given him a broad knowledge of the IT industry from hardware sales and network backbones to large network infrastructure design and consultancy. In 2005 Mark co-founded Radius Recruitment, now a leading boutique IT Recruitment Agency in New Zealand and his flagship business for a number of national and international companies and initiatives. He joined CCC in 2014 as the leader of ourNZ operations.[/peekaboo_content]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Get in touch to learnmore about how CCC can help you grow your business
About Our Management Team - CCC Data Management
Our team of experienced professionals have fostered many successful outsourcing partnerships. We have the knowledge & experience to help you. Learn more.

item.title: Security
item.dc:creator: CCCAdmin
item.content:encoded:
Data Security

We take data security very seriously. If you are a small business, CCC quite possibly has stricter data security in the workplace than you do. We utilise the services of Datacom for its storage of essential and confidential information. Datacom is one of the largest facilities in the world providing security of data for many Australian and New Zealand businesses including banks. In addition to all security around access to its computers, we also provides security through restricted access to our systems to authorised users. The best security cannot always stop individuals committing data theft, whether by accident or design. While we undertake extensive background checks to ensure the best people, company polices are in place so that CCC staff members cannot inadvertently share your data. Our policies might seem quite strict but are designed to protect our clients and our people and include, depending on the role fulfilled
  1. no mobile phones
  2. restricted access to printers
  3. no usb download drives (unless required for the role under supervision)
  4. no social media (unless required for the role)

Company security

CCC is located in the business centre of Manila Makati. The building offers full security of access with 24 hour security staff at the buildings entrance. Additionally, entry into our offices can only occur with a security card which is issued to its current employees only and provides full control of access and recording of its use. The building has backup generators and a BCP (Business Continuity Plan) to ensure even in black outs we are able to continue working.

People

Our people are our greatest asset. For the security of our team and our clients we hire very carefully, all staff have background checks including at least three references. To keep our staff safe our building security is extensive and we follow relevant local OH&S best practice to ensure a safe working environment.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Get in touch to learnmore about how CCC can help you grow your business
Business Data Security Experts - CCC Data Management
We work hard to ensure the security of outsourced data. Our strict security procedures guarantee that your data and confidentiality are not compromised.
Get in touch to learnmore about how CCC can help you grow your business
Our Business Outsourcing Testimonials - CCC DMS
Don't take our word for it! Read client testimonials and discover what they loved about their CCC DMS experience.

While we can't reveal our clients in full on our site currently, to ensure the security of their business (we pride ourselves on our security), a few have been happy to share their feedback on our site. We are able to provide more detailed client lists and testimonials to verified prospective clients upon request.
Get in touch to learnmore about how CCC can help you grow youraccounting practice, or the accounting function within your business

item.title: Gerry from Sydney
item.dc:creator: CCCAdmin
item.content:encoded: I have been using their outsourcing service for bookkeeping purposes and the service provided is exceptional. The quality of work is always at a high standard and have been recommending them to others. I have gained valuable additional resource for a low cost. Thank you.

item.title: Owner at MBC, Melbourne based Accounting practice
item.dc:creator: CCCAdmin
item.content:encoded:
MBC has been utilising the services of CCC since October 2014. During this time we have found that the level of attention to our clients needs has far exceeded our expectations and in fact surpasses that of our Australian based workforce.
CCC has a unique way of on boarding our Philippines staff members. The ongoing supervision and communication makes the process as seamless as possible. The quality of work files is very high and we are very happy with our CCC offshoring experience.
The improvement to our bottom line is amazing without compromise. We have no hesitation in recommending CCC to any Australian based Accounting practice looking to offshore compliance activities.

item.title: Chris - using a number of services from shared, accounting and data portfolios
item.dc:creator: CCCAdmin
item.content:encoded:
We have been with CCCDMS for the past 12 months. Starting with two, we now have 7 staff and expect to take on more in the coming year.
They present high standard work in a reliable manner. Not only are our staff efficient, the cost saving is in excess of 50 percent of what it would cost here in Australia. These savings have kept me competitive in a challenging, ever changing industry.
I have recommended CCCDMS to business associates who are also now using the companys services.

item.title: Thank You
item.dc:creator: CCCAdmin
item.content:encoded: Thank you! Your message has been sent and you will be contacted within 2 - 12 hours by our team.

item.title: Our top 4 reasons to outsource your data entry
item.dc:creator: CCCAdmin
item.content:encoded:
In this competitive world, we all demand precision. Without it, whether youre an architect or accountant, dentist or doctor, youll lose out to your competitors. Buried away at the back of every business is the administration, the data entry, without which your business wont be able to survive. If thats done badly, it can affect everything else from sales to reports, analysis and productivity. Apart from the fact that by outsourcing the administrative work you can contribute your energy and time towards more key activities, here are a few reasons how your business can flourish by data entry outsourcing.
  1. ACCURACY: The data entry operators are qualified and experienced enough to carry out the work accurate accurately. This is very much required, especially in data entry, where even minute errors have an impact.
  2. PRECISE & TIMELY EXECUTION: Outsourcing helps you in carrying out the execution of data entry in a precise manner. Where there are times which require complex data to be entered, your office staff may do it in a manner which turns out to be lengthy or complicated, because of their lack of experience. An outsourced agency can ensure that the entries are executed precisely and in a timely manner.
  3. SPECIALIZATION: An outsourced provider company, like CCC Data Management Services, hires specialists who have the required expertise. We have the staff with expert skills and experience for this kind of job so it is simple to manage and impactful to your business.
  4. ECONOMICAL: If you were to hire an expert solely for your organization, then you may end up paying much more than you need to and have the tasks take far longer! It is best to hire a specialized team for data entry to ensure its carried out in a timely manner. Lower costs for people power when you outsource enable cost effective data entry solutions. If your outsource provider is a recognised data leader they would have an experienced team to do the work, so charges reasonably for its services.
There are some rules of outsourcing; the first one among those is trust! You really need to build trust with your service provider. When you are outsourcing, dont restrict yourself on the basis of distance or location of the service provider. The market is global, so it is important to allow yourself to invite expertise from around the world. If you were to search what is outsourcing, then you may only find the standard definition of it: to send your work away to someone who is expert at it. But the broader definition includes your open mindset and spirit of competitiveness if you embrace this, your business can become more competitive, and you can get on with what you do best.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Accurate data entry can be critical to business success. CCC offers trusted, affordable, economical data entry and we examine the top 4 reasons to outsource
